Name: Custom_Token
Description: Change playmat image to a custom one made by Mint Tea Fan.
LuaScriptState:
[2,{"AltLookAngle":{"x":0,"y":0,"z":0},"Autoraise":true,"ColorDiffuse":{"a":1,"b":1,"g":1,"r":1},"CustomImage":{"CustomToken":{"MergeDistancePixels":15,"Stackable":false,"StandUp":false,"Thickness":0.1},"ImageScalar":1,"ImageSecondaryURL":"","ImageURL":"https://i.ibb.co/6r6LFGz/Zealot-3-Devourer-Below-Sarah-Miller.png","WidthScale":0},"Description":"Click the 'Apply' button to load this image.","DragSelectable":true,"GMNotes":"","Grid":true,"GridProjection":false,"GUID":"f4a462","Hands":true,"HideWhenFaceDown":false,"IgnoreFoW":false,"LayoutGroupSortIndex":0,"Locked":false,"LuaScript":"function onLoad()
   local params          = {}
   params.click_function = 'updatePlayarea'
   params.function_owner = self
   params.label          = 'Apply'
   params.tooltip        = 'Left-Click: Apply image\nRight-Click: Revert to default'
   params.position       = { 0, 0.06, -1.45 }
   params.height         = 300
   params.width          = 675
   params.color          = { 0, 0, 0 }
   params.font_size      = 200
   params.font_color     = { 1, 1, 1 }
   self.createButton(params)
end

function updatePlayarea(_, _, isRightClick)
   local imageswapper = getObjectFromGUID("b7b45b")

   -- error handling
   if imageswapper == nil then
      printToAll("Image swapper could not be found!", "Orange")
      return
   end

   -- get default image when right-clicked, else load its own image
   if isRightClick then
      imageswapper.call("updateSurface")
   else
      imageswapper.call("updateSurface", self.getCustomObject().image)
   end
end
